name: Pendulum Chaos
description:
In this small Platformer, you'll have to  catapult yourself around the level to get to the finish line with the least amount of attempts. 

As a catapult you will be using different pendulums. Normal Pendulums will just swing back and forth in a very predictable way, while the unpredictable chaos-pendulum is a bit harder to understand.

A chaos-pendulum might seem simple: One pendulum attached to another, but once released, things can get very chaotic very quickly...
